name.baseName: Resins for waterborne coatings ; Chemical raw materials ; Batch Synthesis Resin ; All sizes; NESPS2
水性涂料用树脂 ; 化工原料 ; 间歇式合成树脂 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及使用间歇式加工方法合成用于水性涂料的树脂。这种合成树脂用于生产水性涂料，即它们分散在水中而不是有机溶剂中，并应用于不同表面，以提供保护和美观。该间歇式合成树脂在化工行业的所有规模中使用。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码26,四级代码2641文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备耗电量(千瓦时)/(设备额定功率(千瓦)×设备运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCyclone dust removal + bag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是旋风+布袋，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=设备耗电量(千瓦时)/(设备额定功率(千瓦)×设备运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisBio-contact oxidation process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75
